alert.note: Alert for Garden; Grant; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:30PM CDT until August 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GRANT...NORTHEASTERN GARDEN AND SOUTH CENTRAL SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 529 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ellsworth, or 29 miles east of Alliance, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter sized hail 2 miles west of Ellsworth. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Dominick Lake, Jerry Lake, Kincaid Lake, Wild Horse Flats and Patterson Lake. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 111 and 129. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
